thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 9 of 25
thread.title: Shaun

author: Shaun
title: Shaun
text: In the past I've been with Esb (electric ireland), airtricity, and Board Gas. I've always been the type to shop around every 12 months to keep up my discounts on my electric and piped gas. The prices were always fairly decent and I thought no more, the numbers you get told when signing up always seem great. Energia on the other hand actually have the best prices I've every come across. Their customer service, surprisingly including their sales team, come accross so genuine in comparison to any other company I've death with. Energia just tell you how it is and what you will pay and that's what you get. Many many other companies in Ireland need to learn from Energia!
